did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1990-1991

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.931, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1993 February 11.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by John Thomas Casteen, the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files, 1990-1991; seldom used permanent files, 1965-1992; and, adminitrative committee files, 1990-1992.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Files, 1990-1991 Boxes 1-41
SERIES II: Seldom Used Permanent Files, 1965-1992 Boxes 42-56
SERIES III: Administrative Committees Files, 1990-1992 Boxes 57-59
SERIES IV: Restricted Folders, 1990-1992 Boxes 60-61
